features: CONTEMPORARY MODERN DESIGN: Everkitch under cabinet range hood 30 inch brings you trendy and contemporary design that integrates beautifully with your kitchen. This range hood is made of 1 mm thickness stainless steel material with polishing finish. With the heavy-duty housing, this product works very stably without vibration even at the highest speed.
3 SPEEDS TOUCH CONTROL:With 3 speed settings, it is suitable for all kinds of cooking way. The dual motors can run together in 3 speeds. And each motor can run independently in 3 speeds too.

POWERFUL YET QUITE: Everkitch stainless steel range hood 30inch is equipped with two durable copper motors working with strong venting power to clear odor in kitchen. Under good balance of venting performance, the noise level is less than 63dB at the highest speeds.

EASY TO CLEAN FILTERS: The stainless steel filters are dishwasher-safe and durable. You will be free from troubles to clean the grease on cooktop surface, but just clean the filters that collect all the oil grease perfectly.

LONG TERM WARRANTY: We provides with 10 years motor guarantee and 3 years limited parts guarantee. Quality is our life, customer satisfaction is our priority. You could buy Everkitch range hoods with confidence.
body.description: EVERKITCH Under Cabinet Range Hood Powerful Venting EVERKITCH under cabinet range hood/kitchen fan hood has flawless, premium and strong-structured stainless steel body. The stable and strong venting system, with two motors, offers great airflow to remove the odors and smells. You could enjoy the moment of cooking and chatting with families and friends. Easy-installed & removable stainless steel baffle filters collect the grease and are safe for dishwasher cleaning. Efficient LED lights enlighten the cooking area with soft nature lights. Powerful dual motors Noise level: less than 63dB at the highest speed Made of 19 gauge (1mm) thickness premium stainless steel 3 speeds touch control Dimmable LED lamps Auto shut-off delay function

We strive to research & develop modern kitchen appliances, for the improving requirement of families. We are dedicated to provide range hoods with ensured quality & intelligent design to bring you declicious food, protect you from the harmful odor, greasy, humid and steam air. The stable and strong venting system, with two motors, offers great airflow to remove the odors and smells. You could enjoy the moment of cooking and chatting with families and friends. Easy and Convenient to Clean The stainless steel grease filters and stainless steel fan covers are permanent used and dish washer safe. They are easy and convenient to clean.

Powerful Yet Quite Ventilation Sleek Venting Housing reduces noise and vent odour sleekly and quicklyMetal Fans with Non-Stick Coating work in long-term stability and efficiencyDurable & Strong Motors are guaranteed for 10 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. With the two fan system. It definitely sucks everything out of the house while you’re cooking. There’s only two bad things I have to say, one is the lighting isn’t bright enough. Also, it is rather loud. But I like it, because it does a fantastic job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant looking, good lighting, decent air flow
reviews.reviewText: Got this to replace an oversized microwave that was against code (cabinets don’t have clearance for an over the range micro). Delivery was very fast and it does a decent job. Only issue is that there was a small dent in the edge of the hood and I have no idea how to get it out. It was installed before the dent was noticed, but I see it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LUV it - but it chatters! IMPORTANT UPDATE: the chatter is now FIXED!!!
reviews.reviewText: The install was pretty straight forward. I had to do some finagling to do it all be myself, but a pair of quick-grips did the trick! So it is all installed...I turn on the power....push the fan button...and i get a inconsistent "chatter" of metal. I believe it is due to the buttterfly damper kinda flailing about. Other than the fan, the damper is the only other moving part - but it is enclosed within the unit and the exhaust stack so there is no way to verify that doesn't involve completely un-installing the unit.Other than that - it looks quite sharp, the suction power and fan noise are good (not excellent), and the lighting is exactly what was needed! All-in-all, a good value buy!UPDATE! The chatter is fixed!!The "chatter" was NOT the damper! It was the grease grates!!I was on the verge of uninstalling the whole thing...and I just happened to reach down for a tool, and from the corner of my eye I could see the right grease grate jiggling up and down - just enough to make the "chatter" noise. I removed the grate and ever so slightly bent the back edge by a tiny smudgeon - a very long smooth arc sp that the back corners would 'wedge' a bit against the top frame. I put the grate back in - and no more chattering !!! Took the left grate out and repeated the ever so slight bend just to be sure. Put everything back together and tested on all three speeds - and not one time did it chatter anymore. YIPPEE!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, powerful and great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Two years ago, I purchased the 400CFM version from Amazon, and it has been running smoothly. Recently, when the upgraded 800CFM version became available, I decided to make the switch. The 800CFM model shares the same dimensions as its predecessor but offers significantly more power. While the noise level is somewhat loud, it is within expectations for a unit with twin fans. The installation process is straightforward, although the manual is quite basic. Notably, the customer service is impressive, responding to emails promptly—even at 10 pm PST. They promptly sent a free replacement bulb for one that was not functioning properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am surprised at how loud this fan is even on its lowest setting. I specifically looked for fans that were quiet, as my last one was loud as well. Very disappointed in that aspect. The fan itself is attractive; I like the rounded edges. It looks good in my kitchen and it functions well. The lights are bright and really light up the stove top and area around the stove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I mainly purchased this model for the rounded corners. Where my stove is situated, my family would’ve constantly smacked their heads into a sharp corner. It works well so far. The bright light is a welcome change from not having a hood and the power levels are good. I didn’t have a manual…I thought maybe our contractor threw it out but, upon reading the reviews, perhaps it didn’t come with one. The seller has listed how to set the clock in the listing and that’s all I was really missing. Except maybe a warranty?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Impossible to install alone. No mounting brackets for top or bottom.
reviews.reviewText: Impossible to install alone. No mounting brackets for top or bottom. Does not mount like an OTR range.Installation is near impossible alone. - Template for holes is useless / inaccurate.Does not come with any mounting brackets. Does not have bolt holes llke an OTR microwave.Installation is very difficult due to panel only have slide hangars like on a power stripe.You cant easily get your hands on the back bolts to tighten them, better have needle nose pliers.Very Very Very difficult to install. UNIT IS ALSO HEAVYFans are loud but work good.LED Clock on the front of the fan is as bright as a flashlight with no way to dim.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice light and appearance, rattles on Low
reviews.reviewText: This is an attractive range hood and I like the rounded corners. The lights are bright. The vent fan work well, except on low you can hear the internal flaps as they open and close. My contractor said there was nothing that could be done, except dismantle and add soundproofing, which I wasn't inclined to do. On medium and high you can't hear the rattling so I just won't run it on low.

The unit looks good and performs pretty well. The design for the vented option, which in my opinion is the only way to setup any range hood, if possible, could be improved (made larger = more efficient). There is also a visible workmanship imperfection, if you look close enough. The installation booklet is useless, but the installation is pretty straight forward. On the lowest setting the unit is moderately loud, but not terrible at all. Overall, I would recommend this unit.

It appeared to be solidly made, but the fan not only had a dent on it the stainless steel protective wrapping seemed to have been removed and the stainless steel looked dirty. There was no need to hardwire it. It comes with a plug. Fan was returned.
L’aspiration de la vapeur de cuisson laisse à désirer

j'ai été très surprise par le peu de bruit de la hotte , elle est fait solide et les coins rond ce n'est qu'un plus facile d'entretien ,les filtres se lave comme un rien , et elle absorbe la fumé , odeur ,assez bien pour le prix je la recommande . P.S.attention au vendeur , ils ne sont pas tous honnête ...j'ai du racheter la hotte après un mois et demi d'attente a un autre vendeur finalement bon achat .

This is a great exhaust hood for the money. It had ALL of the features that we wanted. First and foremost the corners are rounded and for taller people this is important (NO need for STITCHES). The multi-speed fan works well and the light bulbs are easy to change (we installed 3000 K bulbs for a warmer look). We hardwired the hood and only wish there was a small junction box at the back of the hood to make connecting to the power supply easier but managed to get the job done. The connection plates that were included made installation simple. Hope this helps anyone interested in this hood.
